title: "Permanent vs. Limited Conditioning in Erotic Hypnosis"
first_phrase: In the preceding text, the author explained two types of hypnotic conditioning used in erotic hypnosis. The first one, Permanent Conditioning, involves post-hypnotic suggestions formulated with the assurance that they can be beneficial in all possible situations. This text focuses on how these suggestions can be used to keep a relationship fresh and exciting. The author illustrates this idea through examples of permanent suggestions that can be given to a subject to stimulate their subconscious to search for new ways to seduce their partner. The second type, Limited Conditioning, is discussed in the last part of the text. In contrast to Permanent Conditioning, Limited Conditioning is a more common approach in erotic hypnosis, as it aims to change the current situation in small ways and does not necessarily seek to eliminate problems permanently.
content: También las sugestiones formuladas, como antídoto, en el caso de pérdida de la pareja, son permanentes, aun cuando son eficaces solo después de cierto acontecimiento, que esperamos que no se presente pronto. Para otros tipos de sugestiones puede ser apropiado o no formularlas, de forma permanente. Dicho tipo de SPI en el contexto sexual son las alucinaciones con referente externo. La mayor de parte de estas SPI pueden tener un carácter permanente si se quiere, sin traer ninguna consecuencia negativa, pero se pueden cambiar para dar sabor la relación y para mantenerla fresca y viva. b) Condicionamiento limitado (o restringido) Contrario a lo que se puede suponer, las SPI permanentes, que en la hipnoterapia clásica desempeñan un función predominante, porque se busca con estas superar los problemas, y se desea que no se presentan más, constituyen una minoría en el campo de la hipnosis erótica a causa del contexto particular de esta última.
last_phrase: In conclusion, while permanent suggestions can be effective for overcoming certain issues, they may not be suitable for all contexts, particularly in the realm of erotic hypnosis. It is important to maintain a balance in one's thoughts and focus on other activities and topics outside of the relationship. Limiting the impact of SPIs can lead to a more well-rounded and fulfilling erotic experience for both partners.
